meanings.definition: relating to or involving two or more nations
meanings.sent1: The international meeting included representatives from multiple countries.
meanings.sent2: The trade agreement had important international implications.
meanings.sent3: The international potluck showcased dishes from around the world.
meanings.sent4: The international friendship was as strong as the bonds between nations.
meanings.sent5: The international flag proudly displayed the unity of different countries.

meanings.definition: a person who is a citizen of one country but works in another country
meanings.sent1: Many internationals at the conference shared their experiences of working abroad.
meanings.sent2: The company hired several internationals to bring diverse perspectives.
meanings.sent3: The international chef delighted customers with unique flavors from their homeland.
meanings.sent4: The international artist painted a masterpiece inspired by their dual identity.
meanings.sent5: The international student adapted quickly to the new culture and language.

meanings.definition: a sports competition between teams from different countries
meanings.sent1: The internationals soccer tournament drew fans from all over the world.
meanings.sent2: The Olympics is a well-known event featuring various internationals.
meanings.sent3: The international basketball game had players showcasing their skills globally.
meanings.sent4: The internationals rugby match was a clash of different playing styles.
meanings.sent5: The international swimming competition highlighted the talents of athletes worldwide.
